<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGEN: do NOT edit in this block -->

**command: `/flood`**

**quick ref:**
> /flood [radius or 10] [block_id or water] [x or playerPosX] [y] [z] 

**description:**

```
 flood a given place with a certain radius
e.g. flood with water in a radius of 5 blocks
/flood 5
```

<!-- END_AUTOGEN-->
填充洪水方块，数值以半径计算。
